name: Escape the Enterprise
description:
The scientific research vessel "Enterprise" affiliated to the Star Alliance Navy just finished exploring the new livable planet. On the way back, a girl who was sleeping in the dormant warehouse was suddenly awakened. The alarm told her that the spacecraft had deviated from the route. She began to embark on the journey of investigating the spacecraft, but found that the incident became more and more strange, what happened on the spacecraft?
In the game, the player needs to control the heroine to investigate the various sections on the spacecraft, unravel puzzles, find clues, spell out the truth of each incident, and finally choose their own destiny to escape "Enterprise" .
This game is a 2D pixel suspense puzzle discovery game with fantastic scenes and intriguing plot.
